headline: ComEd Recognized for Advanced Technology and Customer Programs By National Organizations
summary: CHICAGO, October 16, 2025--For its work to bring innovation technology and programs to provide greater service to customers, ComEd programs were recently recognized by Gartner and Public Utilities Fortnightly. These programs focus on improving grid reliability and bringing greater electric vehicle accessibility to customers.
